name: Pocket Planning Poker
description:
Spice up your planning meetings with Pocket Planning Poker: A planning poker app for your Game Boy!

Features:

  • Fibonacci cards from 1 to 233
  • 9 borders
  • 12 stickers for your cards
  • Fibonacci calculator
  • A secret easter egg!
  • Only 32KB

Made with GBDK-2020.
